title: Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dark place in a dream

preview.html: Below we explain Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of imprisonment in a dark place in a dream and we will discuss the different interpretations of this vision, which differ depending on the dreamer, whether he is a man, a single girl, a married woman, or a pregnant woman, in detail as follows: Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that when a person sees in a dream If he is walking in a dark place or street, this is an indication of the dispersion of his affairs and the instability of the state of confusion in the affairs of his life. Being locked in a dark place was a sign of his feeling extremely afraid of something, or his inability to face problems and his failure to overcome the obstacles that stand in his way. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream for a single girl: Darkness in an unmarried girl’s dream is unpleasant, as it portends failure to achieve what She wants to fulfill her dreams and aspirations, as if she saw herself trapped in a dark place. This indicates that she is living in a state of extreme fear. It is evidence of her living in a state of extreme loneliness and lack of a sense of security and security, God willing. But if she sees that she is imprisoned in a place Dark, but she saw a ray of light as if she had found a way out. This is an indication that she has survived a heavy trial and will overcome the crises she is going through. These are psychological, familial, or emotional rulings, God Almighty willing. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself imprisoned in A dark place and she does not find a way out, her dreams are not good because they warn of worries, sadness and serious heartaches. But if he sees a flash of light, it is a good omen. Her dreams are evidence of the arrival of relief after severe distress and relief after hardship, God Almighty willing. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing darkness in a dream is generally considered one of the undesirable visions because it has bad connotations. If a pregnant woman sees that she is imprisoned in a very dark place, her visions indicate that this woman is living in a state of extreme psychological and physical fatigue, and that she is suffering from her pregnancy, but if she sees that she is walking in a place that was dark, but she caught a glimpse of the light at the end of the road. , which indicates the coming of relief and the end of the toil and hardships that he was going through, God willing. If you have a question or dream that you want explained, do not hesitate to put your question in the comment box and we will respond to you as soon as possible. We also invite you to follow our pages on social networking sites, Facebook, Twitter, and others, to receive exclusive dream interpretations. We wish you sweet dreams, peaceful sleep, and be well.

title: What is said in prostration as stated in the pure Sunnah of the Prophet?  The recommended supplications in prayer and memories of sitting between the two prostrations

preview.html: What is said in prostration as mentioned in the Sunnah? Prayer is one of the pillars of Islam, it is the second pillar after the two testimonies. What is bowing? That is why we have prepared this article to know what to say so that our prayers are correct. What is bowing? What is said when bowing? Many people want to complete the prayer in the correct way and avoid mistakes in it, and among the most prominent descriptions mentioned by our noble Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, are the following: “Glory to my Lord, the Almighty” three times. Glory to Your Holiness, Lord of the angels and the spirit. “Glory be to You, O God, our Lord, glory be to You, O God, forgive me, interpret the Qur’an (i.e. do what He commanded in the Qur’an).” “O God, I worship You, I believe in You, I submit to You, and in You I trust. Submissive to God, Lord of the worlds.” Glory be to He who has authority, dominion, pride and majesty. What is said when we rise from bowing? What is said after rising from prostration? We say “Our Lord, to You be praise” or “To You be praise” or “Our Lord be to You be praise.” And the imam and the one who prays alone say: “God hears those who glorify Him.” As for the follower, he says: “Our Lord, to You is glory.” It became clear that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, surpassed this situation by saying: “The people of praise and glory are more deserving of what the servant said, and we are all your servants. God Almighty said: “O God, purify me with snow, hail, and cold water.. O God, purify me from sins and transgressions as a white garment is purified from impurity.” As for what is said since God heard praise for Him? The most prominent formulas in this regard are: “Our Lord, and to You is praise, the righteous and blessed praise, which fills the heavens, and fills the earth, and fills what is between them, and fills what You will.” Click here and see all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dreams on the Egyptian dream interpretation website What is said in bowing? What is said in prostration as mentioned in the Sunnah? Bowing is one of the places where supplications are most answered, which makes many people wonder what is said in prostration? On the authority of Abu Hurairah, may God be pleased with him, he said: The Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “The closest servant to his Lord is the one who prostrates. Pray a lot. As for what is said when bowing in prayer? The most important and prominent supplications of the hadiths can be explained as follows: “Glory to my Lord, the Most High” three times with the possibility of repeating it several times or “Glory to my Lord, the Most High and glory to Him” three times or more. “O God, forgive me all my sins, small and great, first and last, open and hidden.” “O God, forgive me what I have hidden and what I have revealed.” “O God, I worship You, and in You I believe, and in You I surrender, and You are my Lord. My face has been worshipped by the One who created it and shaped it, and perfected its shape and created its hearing and sight. Blessed be Allah, the best of creators.” “Praise be to Allah, the Possessor of Power, Dominion, Pride and Majesty.” “O Allah, place a light in my heart, a light in my hearing, a light in my eyes, a light on my right, a light on my left, a light in front of me, a light behind me, a light above me, a light below me, place a light for me.” “O Allah, I seek refuge in Your pleasure from Your anger, and in Your forgiveness from Your punishment, and I seek refuge in You from You, I cannot measure Your praise, You are as You have praised Yourself.” Hadiths on Prostration and Sujud There are many hadiths that deal with the forms of supplication and recommended remembrances for prostration and sujud, and they can be explained as follows: On the authority of Abdullah ibn Abbas, may Allah be pleased with him

title: Interpretation of a kiss on the mouth in a dream in different cases, complete correct interpretations

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of kissing on the mouth in a dream, as it is one of the famous and recurring visions that many people dream of, and when they wake up from sleep they are very surprised by the meaning of this dream. There are implications for this. Dream interpretation scholars say that the interpretation of the vision depends on the details contained in the dream, as well as on the condition of the viewer. Through the following article on the encyclopedia website, we present to you the most important of these interpretations, so follow us. Interpretation of a kiss from the mouth in a dream: A person who sees in a dream that he is kissing A woman in a dream from her mouth, this dream is one of the good dreams that indicates that the dreamer will get a lot of money that will make his life much better. If the owner of this vision is a scholar, then it indicates his good morals, and his perseverance in reading the Qur’an and thinking about its meaning. If One sees in a dream that he is kissing a woman on the mouth, but he does not feel lust for her, then this dream indicates that this woman is of great benefit in the life of the fortuneteller and that she always gives him useful advice. The symbol of a kiss on the mouth in a dream is one of the visions that have a good meaning for the fortuneteller. To see in his dream that he is kissing a woman in a dream, and this woman was applying cosmetics to her face. Children will be born from it, and their lives together will be full of love and happiness, God willing. One of the unpleasant visions is for someone to dream that he is kissing a girl on the mouth, and this dream symbolizes that the dreamer is committing a major sin, which is drinking alcohol. It is also considered a sign for the dreamer to stop committing that sin and return to God Almighty and ask him to forgive him for his past so that he will not be subjected to severe punishment. A kiss on the mouth in a man’s dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is kissing a woman in a dream, and that that woman was old, then this The dream symbolizes that the dreamer has committed a wrong act in his life and that he feels remorse and pain as a result. Committing this act. If a man sees that he is kissing another man in a dream, then this dream indicates that there is good news awaiting the dreamer and that this news will come to him soon. If one sees that he is kissing a woman he knows in a dream, then this dream indicates that he is hiding feelings The love he feels for this woman and that he tries to express his feelings to her, but he is unable to do so. . Interpretation of a kiss on the mouth of a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a kiss in a dream for a single girl varies in interpretation depending on the details she saw as follows: If the girl is not actually praying and she sees that someone is kissing her on the mouth in a dream, then this dream is a bad dream. Because it indicates the bad things that this girl has, and it is also a sign for her of that. She must stop accompanying friends and vice, improve her morals, and return to her Lord and repent to Him. One of the good visions for an unmarried girl is to see in her dream that someone she does not know kisses her on the mouth, which is what suits her and the marriage between them. If the person who saw her in the dream kisses her on the mouth, then you She knows him, so this dream indicates that she will be counted

title: Interpretation of a dream about a brother being unfair to his sister in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a brother being unfair to his sister in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a brother being unfair to his sister in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a brother being unfair to his sister in a dream. Seeing another person's injustice can express bad things, and God knows the unseen. Whereas wrongdoing expresses the collapse of the home and its troubles, and God knows the unseen. While injustice may indicate God's forgiveness, God also has knowledge. If the dreamer sees injustice from his relatives, this may indicate tension in His relationship with the family, and God knows the unseen.Interpretation of a dream about my lost nephew in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my lost nephew in a dream We did not find clear meanings for seeing this. However, seeing a lost child in a dream can be a sign of loss, and God knows the unseen. When you see the loss of a son, it can turn To pressure, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if a married man sees the loss of a child, this may indicate a loss of hope, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my niece crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream when I see my niece crying in a dream may reflect the difficult psychological state of the aunt, and God knows best. The unseen, as it can express the psychological problems that the dreamer is going through, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her niece crying, this may be a sign of the disintegration of the family, and God Almighty knows. If a married man sees his niece crying, this may indicate failure at work. Or study, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my little niece in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my little niece in a dream could indicate longevity, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the death of her niece, this may indicate the stability of the life she lives, and God knows best, while seeing the death of her niece It may express problems and troubles, and God knows the unseen. It may also express the sister being exposed to troubles, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. I dreamed that my niece got married in a dream. I dreamed that my niece got married in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for watching my sister’s wedding. However, seeing my niece in a dream could be evidence of love. And attachment to her, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself breastfeeding her sister’s daughter in a dream, this may be an indication of goodness and living, and God knows the unseen. It may also indicate seeing her sister’s daughter marrying her cousin’s son. It may represent the paternal aunt’s pregnancy, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream when If the dreamer sees His niece in a dream, this may be evidence of good news, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees a niece, it can be a sign of happiness, God willing. Interpretation of dreams when I see my niece hugging me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: Seeing my niece hugging me in a dream can be a sign On many things: If a pregnant woman is seen hugging and breastfeeding her niece, humiliation may result

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about perfumes for a divorced woman Perfumes are one of everyone's favorite things, indicating the extent of a person's interest in himself and his interest in his external appearance, and it has been used for thousands of years, as it is extracted from some flowers. Such as violets and jasmine flowers, and seeing perfume in a dream is one of the visions that are generally commendable, but there are some cases that carry bad interpretations for its owner, and the following are the most prominent sayings of scholars in interpreting a dream about perfumes for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream about perfumes by Ibn Sirin in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream about perfumes for a divorced woman? Scholars agreed that seeing a bottle of perfume from a divorced woman indicates the arrival of good things and a change in circumstances for the better, because perfume always symbolizes beautiful compensation after many years of suffering and pain. When you smell a beautiful scent filling the place where the divorced woman is, this indicates happy events and soon good news and can indicate the righteousness of religion, the strength of faith, and walking on the path of truth and charitable care. It works. The bad smell expresses the sorrows and many obstacles that may block the path of life and may be an indication of the plots of the ex-husband who wants to take revenge on the dreamer and cause her a lot of trouble. If she was anxious and put perfume on her clothes, this is evidence of relief from anxiety and the end of anxiety. As for the patient who sees the perfume bottle, it portends a healthy recovery and the end of the calamity if she is sick. The matter is simple. While chronic illness indicates imminent death and a good end. Perfumes in a dream for a divorced woman are a sign of peace of mind and psychological stability or an indication of good morals and a good reputation among people. Ibn Shaheen says about a divorced woman who perfumes the bed that the vision indicates a secret desire to marry again and search for love and pleasure. Imam al-Sadiq believes that throwing a bottle of perfume on the ground means losing money, excessive debt, failure of trade, and extreme poverty. Interpretation of a dream about perfume by Ibn Sirin in a dream The respected scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted a divorced woman's dream of perfume as a sign of good luck and success in all matters of life. The appearance of an empty perfume bottle in a dream is considered a bad omen for poor health and deterioration of physical condition or a sign of many experiences and accumulation of worries and difficulty finding solutions to overcome these crises. As for the fullness of the perfume bottle, it symbolizes a woman's intelligence and her superior ability to get out of trouble without loss. If a woman sells her perfume herself, this is a bad sign of wasted opportunities and not exploiting them properly, or leads to separation and death or the loss of valuable things that she already owned. Spraying perfume indicates a life full of With happy situations and joys, and a sign of success, achieving high grades, and striving to achieve hopes. Buying a bottle of perfume is a good omen for earning a lot of money after all the effort or getting a large inheritance. When a woman keeps the bottle in her pocket, it means that she will enjoy many benefits at the personal level.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife laughing at me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife laughing at me in a dream. Are you wondering what your dream hides? Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife laughing at me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream with my ex-wife laughing at me in a dream could be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. But if the dreamer sees a divorced woman laughing out loud This may lead to a lack of chivalry, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. preview.html: As for people who suffer from excessive daydreaming, these people suffer from forgetfulness a lot and forget a lot of things that they are supposed to do in their lives, which leads to failure. The concept of daydreaming Daydreams are alternative thoughts to realistic thoughts. In the event that the motives they are looking for are not met In his real world. He resorts to achieving this with imagination, which satisfies his instinct and relieves him of stress and anxiety. Among the examples we provide to explain the meaning of daydreams, he is like the poor who live daydreams. Be a rich loser who dreams of reaching the highest peak of glory. See also: Would you Do you have an interpretation of morning dreams? Do daydreams come true? There are some beliefs that daydreams can come true due to martial law. The law of gravity may be true. The proof of this is that many scientists, geniuses, thinkers and inventors. At first they thought in their imagination of the things and events that they reached Indeed, daydreaming has become a reality overnight and has become of great benefit to humanity all over the world. The dream has become a goal in the lives of others that can be achieved in reality. Is daydreaming normal or pathological? Daydreaming is not required to be a mental illness. Young people, especially teenagers, They are the most affected by it. This is normal considering how long these young people and teenagers live. But it must be taken into account when you notice that it has become excessive, it becomes worrying. The young man has reached a state of addiction to daydreaming, so the matter must be dealt with because it has become A pathological condition. Causes of daydreaming: One of the first reasons for daydreaming that pushes a person to immerse himself in it, which results in many psychological illnesses that many young people suffer from, and among these reasons are: Lack of confidence: Many people suffer from a lack of self-confidence, and this condition comes as a result of Parents' disappointment in their children and belittle them and their personalities. Young people's self-confidence can also be lost through self-aggression. His image falls short of himself, so he resorts to creating a new image and personality by inserting them into his daydreams to compensate for their feelings of inadequacy. Irritation: When he fails A person tries to reach a certain goal with disappointment and defeat. This results in him entering into daydreams to complete the deficiency. And his inability on earth to achieve his desires that he pursues in vain as a result of the disappointment he suffers. The inability to adapt. The nature of the life that a person lives is to meet who they are. Older than him, for example, for a family, there is a father and a mother who have authority. The same applies to institutions and universities, where they are run by professors, university doctors, and others who have their own ideas that do not match the ideas of these new people. They all turn against the young people, accusing them of being Revolutionaries. Hence the conflict and conflict in the face of the young man, and he begins to struggle with himself. From here we find that the young man enters into daydreams and lives with himself. He begins to act the role of authority and

title: Interpretation of escaping from the police in a dream

preview.html: Escaping from the police in a dream, one of the disturbing dreams for many is the dream of escaping or hiding from someone, and when one sees escaping from the police in a dream, this dream causes a lot of anxiety and panic to the viewer. A different website provides In this article, the interpretation of a dream about escaping from the police in a dream. A symbol of escaping from the police in a dream. It has been stated in the interpretation of the vision of escaping from the police in a dream by the dream interpretation sheikhs that this vision is good news for removing the dreamer’s worries and problems and allowing him to achieve his dreams. And his desires. Seeing him escaping from the police in a dream and the dreamer was with a child escaping from the police with him, symbolizes the dreamer’s fear of the coming days. In the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin, seeing him escaping in a dream shows the differences and problems that the sleeper faces in his real life, and his strong desire to get rid of One of these crises causes him a lot of pressure and problems. Seeing him escaping from the police in a dream also explains the presence of disputes or differences of opinion with his family, or the presence of a problem in the dreamer’s life that he is trying to deal with and get rid of. Interpretation of escaping from the police in a dream for a man is among those The interpretations given for seeing escaping from the police in a dream for a man, this dream indicates that this dreamer will suffer many losses at the level of his work or financial losses in the coming period. And if the sleeper sees in a dream that he is trying to escape and is able to escape, then this is interpreted by the imminence of obtaining some money in the future. The coming days. When a divorced man sees in his dream that the police are chasing his ex-wife, this dream heralds him returning to his ex-wife again and arranging their life together unlike the previous one. When a man sees in a dream that a policeman is standing next to his wife, chasing him, and the sleeper does not move from his place. This indicates that there are some family disputes between the fortuneteller and his wife, but he will do so. Be able to settle disputes. If a man sees in a dream that the police are pursuing him while he is trying to escape from them, but he is not afraid, this is a sign that he has assumed an important position. But if he sees that he is afraid while escaping, this indicates that he will face a lot of big problems. Seeing him escaping from the police in a dream for an unmarried young man, explains his lack of success in his professional life, the problems he faces and suffers from, and the presence of some evil people in his life. Interpretation of escaping from Police in a dream for a single womanIn the interpretation of escaping from the police in a dream about a single girl, this dream indicates that if the girl can escape and stay away from the police, the dreamer will be able to fulfill his long-awaited desires. If a girl is trying to escape from the police in a dream with a friend, the dream indicates the good reputation that this girl has and that everyone around her loves and respects her. Whereas if a single girl saw in her dream that the police were chasing her and asking her to show her identity, then the dream is... Its interpretation is that a job opportunity appears for the dreamer, and the job may be outside the country in which he lives. he. where is she

title: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream means money and money in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about money for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, either giving or receiving money from a living or dead person, paper money, spending, buying, discoveries and more about Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabul. Interpretation of money in a dream Money in a dream is a sign of success and advancement , whether it is success on a personal level, such as a person's relationships with others, friends, relatives, or marriage, but also on a practical level, such as achieving profit and gains. Money in a dream is a sign of safety, security, and a sense of self-confidence. Money can symbolize power and influence. If one sees money in his dream, it means that the person has reached a great degree of psychological balance, and thus the person obtains a very high level of satisfaction in everything. Finding or finding money in a dream promises An indication of the continuous effort that a person makes to achieve and achieve his goals. Seeing someone giving money in a dream is a sign of excellence and progress in society, work or study. Seeing receiving and taking money or money in a dream means that you are achieving and achieving goals and also achieving profit and gain. Seeing money or papers Cash in a dream indicates a decrease in wealth and its size, but the meaning of the shortage is not bankruptcy or poverty, but rather this shortage will only be for a temporary period. Seeing money and money burning, as if a person is burning a bill of exchange, a check, or any other security, means a great loss of money and wealth, and it may It portends that this person will be robbed, so he should be careful. Seeing silver coins in a dream is a clear indication of loss, whether in the value of shares in the stock market or in the decline in the value of real estate or the value of the bank. Seeing yourself making money or profit in a dream does not necessarily mean profit. Or profit in reality, it may indicate that you are facing financial problems or crises in the near future. Dreaming of burying money, burying treasure, or even collecting and storing it in a dream is an indication of a continued lack of money and poverty. Seeing money in a dream in the form of liquid silver indicates an increase in... Problems between spouses, which may lead to separation and divorce, God forbid. Seeing money in a dream can mean a person’s need, whether male or female, for emotional stability or marriage. Accordingly, scholars and commentators said about the importance of seeing money in this context: The dream of a dreamer who loses or spends a lot of money is an indication of the man or woman’s great need to get married and find a partner. Seeing the pocket, wallet, or bag empty or empty in the dream indicates the extent of the man’s need. Or women and the lack of passion, love and affection in their lives. Seeing money in a dream for a single man or girl in a dream is an indication and good news of meeting a life partner soon. Seeing money in the form of gold coins or gold wealth indicates the inability of the man or woman to get married. And their inability to marry due to financial or other problems. Giving money to unmarried people or

title: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a baby from a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child from a pregnant woman’s breastInterpretation of dreams about breastfeeding in Ibn Sirin’s dream Breastfeeding, as we know, is an important matter for newborns, and the mother continues to breastfeed for up to two years, after which the child can be weaned and begin eating other foods such as yogurt. And some light vegetables in the stomach. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a baby from a pregnant woman’s breast in various ways. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Breastfeeding a baby in a dream is a sign of good and happy news. Seeing a baby being breastfed in a dream indicates the presence of problems and fears. Dreaming about not being able to breastfeed Naturalness is a sign of failure. Breastfeeding in a dream can indicate tenderness and the need for attention. Seeing the difficulty of breastfeeding is evidence that you are facing some difficulties and problems. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding in a dream for a man: Seeing an old man Breastfeeding in a dream means bad news. Seeing a man in a dream around a woman’s breast means happiness. Seeing a man breastfeeding a woman is evidence of his imprisonment and deprivation of many important things in his life. If a man sees in a dream that he is breastfeeding a child, this is good for him. Seeing a man Breastfeeding in a dream may indicate his sexual desires. Seeing small breasts in a dream is a sign of the difficulties that a man faces in his life. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman breastfeeding her son in a dream indicates that the problems she is going through are over and that she will be Lucky. If a woman dreams of a man breastfeeding her and he knows it well, this means that he will take illegal money from her. Filling a woman’s breasts with milk is good for her. Breastfeeding a child in a dream indicates happy news. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding her child and is sad This is harmful to her. A married woman who breastfeeds a child in a dream indicates pregnancy in the near future. Read also: Cutting hair in a dream for a woman. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream breastfeeding her child, and that was in the first months of pregnancy, means that The fetus will have great value and power. Dreaming about breastfeeding for a pregnant woman means an easy and trouble-free birth. Seeing a pregnant woman, whose breasts have grown due to breastfeeding, indicates the good that the visionary will receive. Seeing a pregnant woman breastfeeding a man in a dream indicates difficulty Pregnancy and childbirth. Dream interpretation of breastfeeding in a dream for a single woman. Breastfeeding in a dream is beneficial for her. If a woman sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding by a man, this is her evil and her illness. Seeing a girl breastfeeding indicates her marriage contract. Interpretation of a dream of breastfeeding a baby girl in a dreamIf a woman sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding Her daughter, who is in reality suffering from an illness, then this vision is good news that she will recover quickly, God willing. If a woman sees in a dream how she is breastfeeding her child, this indicates a bright future and the achievement of her goals and dreams. If a woman dreams
